com.mjun.mtransition

类 MTransitionPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mjun.mtransition.MTransitionPage
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ITransitional

    public class MTransitionPage
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITransitional

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      MTransitionPage(boolean isFromPage, ITransitPrepareListener listener) 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      MTransitionView addTransitionView(java.lang.String name, android.view.View view)
      添加需要做动画的View NOTE:动画View的深度层次跟添加顺序有关，先添加的在底层，后添加的在顶层，但是可以通过MTransitionView.below(MTransitionView) 或者MTransitionView.above(MTransitionView) 调整顺序 Add Views that need to transit during Transition NOTE: The depth level of views is related to the order of additions, first added at the bottom level, and later added at the top level, but can be adjusted by MTransitionView.below(MTransitionView) or MTransitionView.above(MTransitionView)
      MTransitionView getContainer() 
      MTransitionView getTransitionView(java.lang.String name)
      获取name对应的 MTransitionView实例 Get MTransitionView instance by name
      boolean isPrepared()
      是否已经准备好去执行场景切换动画 Is Prepare to excute Transiton
      void onTransitEnd()
      动画结束时回调 Callback when Transition end
      void onTransitProgress(long playTime, float progress)
      动画执行时回调 Callback when Transition is executed
      void onTransitStart()
      动画开始时回调 Callback when Transition start
      void setContainer(android.view.View container, ITransitPrepareListener listener)
      设置当前动画页的最外层View NOTE：必须要调用该方法之后，才能调用MTransition.start()或者MTransition.reverse()或者该类的其他方法,否则会报错 Set the Container View of the page NOTE:You must call this method before you can call MTransition.start() or MTransition.reverse() or other methods of this class, or you will get an error.

      • onTransitProgress

        public void onTransitProgress(long playTime,
                              float progress)
        动画执行时回调 Callback when Transition is executed
        指定者:
        onTransitProgress 在接口中 ITransitional
        参数:
        playTime - 动画已经执行的时长
        progress - 动画已经执行的进度

      • setContainer

        public void setContainer(@NonNull
                         android.view.View container,
                         @Nullable
                         ITransitPrepareListener listener)
        设置当前动画页的最外层View NOTE：必须要调用该方法之后，才能调用MTransition.start()或者MTransition.reverse()或者该类的其他方法,否则会报错 Set the Container View of the page NOTE:You must call this method before you can call MTransition.start() or MTransition.reverse() or other methods of this class, or you will get an error.
        参数:
        container -
        listener -

      • getContainer

        public MTransitionView getContainer()

      • addTransitionView

        public MTransitionView addTransitionView(java.lang.String name,
                                         android.view.View view)
        添加需要做动画的View NOTE:动画View的深度层次跟添加顺序有关，先添加的在底层，后添加的在顶层，但是可以通过MTransitionView.below(MTransitionView) 或者MTransitionView.above(MTransitionView) 调整顺序 Add Views that need to transit during Transition NOTE: The depth level of views is related to the order of additions, first added at the bottom level, and later added at the top level, but can be adjusted by MTransitionView.below(MTransitionView) or MTransitionView.above(MTransitionView)
        参数:
        name - View的名字，用于存储时作为Key
        view - 需要做动画的View
        返回:
        根据View生成一个对应的 MTransitionView实例

      • getTransitionView

        public MTransitionView getTransitionView(java.lang.String name)
        获取name对应的 MTransitionView实例 Get MTransitionView instance by name
        参数:
        name - View的名字
        返回:
        MTransitionView实例

        public boolean isPrepared()
        是否已经准备好去执行场景切换动画 Is Prepare to excute Transiton
